name: LogConfig
description:
The configuration of the SDK log files.Since
  v3.3.0

parameters.filePath:
The absolute path of the log files. Ensure that the directory for the log
                            files exists and is writable. You can use this parameter to rename the
                            log files. 
                        The default file path is /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<package
                                        name>/files/agorasdk.log
                        The default file path is:
                                        If Sandbox is enabled: App
                                                Sandbox/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log, for
                                                example,
                                                /Users/<username>/Library/Containers/<App
                                                Bundle
                                                Identifier>/Data/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log.
                                        If Sandbox is disabled:
                                                ~/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log

parameters.fileSize:
The size (KB) of a log file. The default value is 2014 KB. If you set
                            fileSize to 1024 KB, the maximum aggregate size of
                        the log files output by the SDK is 5 MB. If you set
                            fileSize to less than 1024 KB, the setting is
                        invalid, and the maximum size of a log file is still 1024 KB.

parameters.level: The output level of the SDK log file. See LOG_LEVEL.
